wasmByteCode.description: WASMByteCode can be raw or gzip compressed

source.description: Source is a valid absolute HTTPS URI to the contract's source code, optional

builder.description: Builder is a valid docker image name with tag, optional

defaultDuration.description: InstantiatePermission to apply on contract creation, optional  AccessConfig InstantiatePermission = 5;

MsgStoreCode.title: Msg Store Code
MsgStoreCode.description: StoreCode is used so we can upload code for testing, will be removed on mainnet
